timeline.author: viliam-durina

timeline.bodyText: Might be better to use InferTypesTestSupport as a utility rather than as a superclass.
timeline.author: viliam-durina

replies.bodyText: This is a common pattern that we use throughout IMDG - define "*Support" class and then extend it. I think both approaches are roughly equal - no big win, no big harm wrt each other.
replies.author: devozerov

replies.bodyText: It will show if you try to use a method from another support class. Utility classes are more flexible.
replies.author: viliam-durina
